[Java] Interface TenantDataSource

public interface TenantDataSource

Created by Felipe Cypriano Date: 08/04/2009 Time: 08:30:29

Base interface to TentantDataSource. To be able to use it injected by Spring. DataSource extension that allows for a custom url per tenant.

Field Summary
boolean multiTenant

This tells spring to manage a datasource per tenant
